meanings.definition: A type of cancer that affects the blood and bone marrow, characterized by an abnormal increase in white blood cells.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that leukaemias are a serious illness that require immediate treatment.
meanings.sent2: The hospital was conducting research on different types of leukaemias to find better treatments.
meanings.sent3: When the leukaemias decided to throw a party in the bone marrow, the red blood cells felt left out.
meanings.sent4: The leukaemias invaded the bloodstream like an army of rebellious soldiers.
meanings.sent5: The image of leukaemias multiplying uncontrollably haunted her dreams.
